sub_title: Strategic Digital Pioneer & Organizational Catalyst | Steering Global Change & Growth | MBA Candidate | Available for the next challenge
summary:
Seasoned leader in strategic marketing with expertise in digital transformation, change orchestration, product stewardship, e-commerce mastery, content innovation, and the alchemy of both internal and external communication.

Notable triumphs include architecting marketing strategies for an emerging regional cluster, achieving radical simplification, heightened efficiency, and a leaner bottom line. Spearheaded multi-country TV negotiations, finessing both quality and cost. Initiated and rolled out a global Digital Asset Management system and a Learning & Development platform that are now benchmarks.

Renowned for captaining high-stakes, global initiatives with the finesse of a conductor leading an orchestra through a complex symphony. Skillful in guiding diverse ensembles and instilling a high-performance culture, even when the tempo of business reaches prestissimo.

Deeply committed to Diversity & Inclusion, Artificial Intelligence, and the art of work-life balance. My mission is less about breaking glass ceilings and more about redefining the architecture of modern leadership.

I wear many hats— with style: a mother, a mentor, an industry thought leader, an emotionally intelligent guide, a pragmatic visionary, and a catalyst for change. 

Curious for a dialogue? Reach out here or at kingabali.nl@gmail.com.

profile_positions.description:
Career Highlights:
✅ Orchestrated end-to-end selection, launch, and optimization of a global learning and development platform while fostering close collaborations with procurement, legal, IT, and integration teams.
✅ Led the recruitment, training, development, and leadership of two remote teams, managing a dynamic workforce ranging from 15-30 members based on project requirements.
✅ Pioneered campaigns, learning, and communication assets, aligning with consultancy and HR teams on the competency framework to enhance company-wide understanding and adoption.
✅ Led the communications team to develop assets supporting the global communications and event strategy, including video production for senior management.
✅ Held budgetary responsibility for 1 million+ euro, ensuring optimal allocation, reporting, cost-savings, and comprehensive project management.
✅ Launched and optimized multiple collaborative platforms to facilitate improved internal communication and collaboration across global teams.

Key Responsibilities:
📌 Engaged with senior management on strategic communications initiatives, including asset development, video production, and large-scale virtual event coordination.
📌 Integrated legacy systems with new platforms to create a cohesive environment for over 2500 marketers worldwide, ensuring seamless communication and collaboration.
📌 Aligned with HR teams on competency frameworks to ensure consistent training and development strategies across global teams.
📌 Oversaw reporting, cost, and savings optimization to ensure the most efficient allocation of resources and realization of project objectives.

Related Skills: Digital Platform Integration, Strategic Planning & Implementation, Cross-functional Collaboration, Employee Correspondence, Key Relationship Building, Training & Development, Project management, Product ownership, Content creation, Analytical Proficiency, Stakeholder Relationship Building, Budget Management, Agency relationships, Procurement.
profile_positions.title: Global Digital Transformation and Employee Engagement Lead - Community and Change Manager

profile_positions.description:
Key Milestones Achieved:
✅ Streamlined the end-to-end selection, launch, and optimization of a globalDAM /Digital Asset Management/ system for the Hygiene-Home, enhancing global access to critical marketing assets, their royalty information, claims, approval steps, and media efficiency.
✅ Advocated for and disseminated eCRM and social media best practices from a marketing and digital media point of view and also as a GDPR champion.
✅ Formulated and realized customer engagement strategies that integrated medical and regulatory requirements too.
✅ Held budgetary responsibility for 1 million+ euro, ensuring optimal allocation, reporting, cost-savings, and comprehensive project management.

Responsibilities:
📌 Pioneered customer lifetime value strategies and social media initiatives to optimize eCRM programs' ROI.
📌 Managed campaigns tailored to pharmaceutical regulations too, coordinating with legal, medical, and regulatory teams.
📌 Offered expertise in communications planning, activation, measurement, and trend identification.

Most Important Skills:
Strategic Planning & Implementation, Customer Engagement, Brand Advocacy, Content Development, DAM, Digital Asset Management, Cross-functional Collaboration, CRM, eCRM, Legal, Medical, and Regulatory Coordination, Senior Stakeholder Management, Budget Responsibility, Team Work, Management.
profile_positions.title: Global Transformation Lead - DAM, CRM & Social Media

profile_positions.description:

 ✅ Steered multi-country TV negotiations, optimizing price and GRPs quality with a substantial budget.

 ✅ Streamlined agency networks for increased flexibility and market adaptability, reducing overheads.

 ✅ Innovative Campaigns: Spearheaded e-pharma campaigns, content collaborations, and data collection projects, leveraging team expertise.
 ✅ Developed 100+ SEO and platform-optimized brand, promotional & data collection sites.
 ✅ Recruiting and training the operational media team. 
 ✅ Served as GDPR champion.

Responsibilities:
📌 Orchestrated online, offline, TV, media, and communications strategies for CEE and West Balkans.
📌 Spearheaded multi-country media processes, including planning, buying, and display strategy, including KPIs, measurement, and reporting. 
📌 Championed e-commerce, product sampling, and employer branding projects.
📌 Conducted regular training on media and digital topics for internal teams.

Most Important Skills: 
Strategic Planning & Implementation, E-commerce, Brand Management, Profit Optimization, Project Management, Negotiation, Change Management, Teamwork, Management, Leadership, Recruiting, Digital Transformation, GDPR, SEO, Pharma Operations.

profile_positions.description:
Career Highlights:
✅ Architected annual online brand communication roadmaps for Nestlé, ensuring end-to-end solutions from conception to delivery.
✅ Worked hand-in-hand with Brand Managers to seamlessly translate brand narratives into impactful digital stories across various platforms.
✅ Played a pivotal role in bringing select e-commerce projects to life, optimizing them from a digital communication perspective.
✅ Scouted and harnessed innovative digital opportunities, ensuring Nestlé maintained its edge in a rapidly changing digital environment.
✅ Spearheaded content curation across varied online consumer engagement platforms, including CRM, WEB, and SM.
✅ Devised a comprehensive CRM strategy to assimilate data from seven key departments, enhancing cross-functional synergy.
✅ Led digital initiatives to craft resonant narratives for both the overarching corporate brand and mainstay products, enhancing brand visibility and deepening consumer connections.

Key Responsibilities:
📌 Bridged the gap between brand communication, digital progression, and e-commerce optimization at Nestlé.
📌 Collaborated closely with the Communication Director to craft purposeful strategies that reflected the brand's core values and catered to a broad consumer audience.
📌 Managed the hands-on execution of digital communication strategies, ensuring alignment with the broader corporate goals.
📌 Continuously sought out new digital trends and emergent technologies to keep Nestlé at the forefront of the industry.
📌 Took the initiative to bolster the digital skills of marketing teams, implementing training programs and building a solid digital agency network to enhance Nestlé's online footprint.

Related Skills: Digital Strategy & E-commerce Integration, Brand Communication, Cross-functional Collaboration, Digital Communication Execution, Content Curation, CRM Strategy & Implementation, Digital Trendspotting, Training & Development, Agency Network Development, Brand Narrative Translation.
profile_positions.title: Integrated Brand, Digital Strategy & E-commerce Integration Lead – Nestlé

profile_positions.description:
Key Achievements:
✅ Client Acquisition: Successfully converted numerous business proposals into signed contracts, driving significant revenue growth for the division.
✅ Artist Collaborations: Launched multiple successful artist-centric digital campaigns and merchandising projects, elevating our reputation in the industry.

My responsibilities spanned across the following domains:
📌 Business Proposals: Crafting compelling business proposals tailored to the unique needs and challenges faced by potential clients, ensuring they could envision our value proposition vividly.
📌 Contractual Expertise: Delving into the intricacies of preparing contracts, ensuring every stipulation was framed with clarity and foresight. Also managed licensing negotiations to safeguard our intellectual and creative rights.
📌 Artist-Centric Projects: Orchestrating projects centered around artists, ranging from digital product launches, and promotional campaigns, to strategic merchandising endeavors.
📌 Market Research & Analysis: Continuously monitored the digital marketing landscape to identify emergent trends, ensuring our proposals were cutting-edge and resonated with potential client needs.
📌 Client Relationship Management: Maintained and nurtured relationships with both existing and potential clients, ensuring their needs were addressed promptly and their feedback was integrated.
📌 Collaboration & Teamwork: Worked closely with our internal teams - design, content, and tech - to ensure the projects were executed flawlessly.

Main Skills:
Account Management, Business Development, Negotiations, Cross-Functional Cooperation, Digital Marketing, Contracting, Leadership, Manaement.
profile_positions.title: Digital Business Development & Artist Project Manager - Digital Marketing Division

My encompassing responsibilities were:
📌 Strategic PR Planning: Crafted bespoke communication plans and PR strategies for our main clients, ensuring alignment with their overarching business goals.

volunteer_experiences.description:
As the Head of Circles and Community Growth, as part of the Leadership team of the Lean In Network | Netherlands Randstad, my mission is to design an overall strategy and direction of the current and future Circles teams and the development of new community programs on the fields of diversity and inclusion. 

Internal and external partnerships and content generation are also high-priority on my agenda such as building, inspiring, and motivating our members and potential future members. 

Our goal is to build a more equitable Netherlands where everyone can reach their full potential no matter their shape, size, gender or religion, while being their autentic selves and be celebrated by their unique strenghts.
